name: The Hometrotters
tag_list: free-accommodation, hospitality, thehometrotters, travel, viajar, sleep-for-free, turismo, viajar-gratis
overview:
The Hometrotters (THT) is the smart way to discover the World. We connect people who love travelling, visiting different cities and countries, meeting new people, immersing themselves into new cultural environment.

The Hometrotters (THT) features a free hospitality exchange web service for international NGOs and communities and facilitates the process by providing access to free accommodation, low-cost flights and local events information. Meanwhile the THT model limits significantly any safety concerns connecting you to verified members of your own community, e.g. AIESEC

The Hometrotters was born with a philosophy based on three concepts: saving money in your trips since you don’t pay for accommodation, making your journeys more enriching living like a local and meeting new people traveling or hosting them when they visit your city.

Visit www.thehometrotters.com
